metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13508 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreeTDS through 1.1.11 has a Buffer Overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freetds-bin - 0.91-6.1build1
freetds-common - 0.91-6.1build1
libct4 - 0.91-6.1build1
libsybdb5 - 0.91-6.1build1
tdsodbc - 0.91-6.1build1
No subscription required

advisory.DiscoveredBy: Felix Wilhelm from the Google Security Team

criterions.comment: freetds package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.91-6.1build1').
